content: and pull through now have 4 loops is written to be able to cut the yarn after every on your hook now yo and pull through 2 round if you want to use the same colour for loops yo and pull through all 3 loops the next round check carefully so that you start the next round in the correct place dc3tog yo insert hook through stitch to be worked yo and pull through yo and pull when beginning a round you can replace the through 2 loops yo insert hook into same frst stitch by using a standing stitch or chain stitch yo and pull through yo and pull stitch es as preferred through 2 loops 3 loops on your hook now yo insert hook into same stitch yo and pull finishing through yo and pull through 2 loops yo and pull through all 4 loops there are many colour changes in this pattern resulting in many yarn ends to secure 12 this is the stitch count for each round & the number shows how many stitches you where possible you can crochet over some should have at the end of the round chain-sts of the yarn ends as you go along but in some included places it may be best to use a tapestry needle feel free to use the method you special stitches are explained at the relevant prefer round the placemats shown in the pattern are only steam blocked to fnish off we felt wet blocking was unnecessary for this cotton yarn this will of course depend on your choice of yarn original design
